PERSONA.NAME: Sir John Falstaff
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A fat aristocrat looking for a rich mistress.

NAME.short: SHAL., ALL PAGE. AND SHAL. AND SLEN.

PERSONA.NAME: Robert Shallow
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A country justice, cousin to Slender

NAME.short: SLEN., ALL PAGE. AND SHAL. AND SLEN.

PERSONA.NAME: Francis Ford
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A gentleman of Windsor, husband to Alice Ford. Later disguised as Brook.

NAME.short: PAGE., ALL PAGE. AND SHAL. AND SLEN.

PERSONA.NAME: George Page
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A gentleman of Windsor, husband to Margaret Page

PERSONA.NAME: William Page
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A boy, son to George and Margaret Page, brother to Anne Page

PERSONA.NAME: Doctor Caius
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A French physician and suitor to Anne Page.

PERSONA.NAME: Bardolph
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Falstaff's follower, serves beer at the Garter Inn

PERSONA.NAME: Pistol
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Falstaff's follower, alter disguised as Hobgoblin.

PERSONA.NAME: Mistress Margaret Page
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also called Meg, wife to George Page

PERSONA.NAME: Mistress Anne Page
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter of Francis and Anne Page, sister to William Page. Intends to marry Fenton.

PERSONA.NAME: Servant
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: John, Robert, and various other servants.
